ComicInfo.Penciller: Todd McFarlane,Jim Sanders,Chris Ivy,Todd McFarlane,Jim Sanders,Chris Ivy
ComicInfo.Summary: Closing Curtain: Bruce and company arrive at Yuma Base and learn that gamma bombs have been stolen. The Leader contacts them and tells them that he is going to detonate a bomb in Middletown at 10 P.M. The Hulk goes in alone and battles Rock and Redeemer. When he defeats them, he is confronted by the Leader. The Leader detonates the bomb early and, as Rick and Betty look on in horror, the Hulk is caught in the blast.
